headline: Corpay (NYSE:CPAY) Highlights Success Of AP Automation With Computer Guidance Collaboration
summary: Corpay (NYSE:CPAY) recently partnered with Computer Guidance Corporation to enhance integrated accounts payable automation, subsequently unveiling their successful joint case study with S.T. Wooten. This development highlights Corpay's innovations in streamlining payment processes, coinciding with its 13% share price increase over the last month. During the same period, Corpay reported improved Q1 earnings and expanded its partnership with Mastercard, which involved a $300 million investment,...
